section.name: Overview
section.p: Dalma engine ships with the hangman example that implements the hangman game by using the e-mail endpoint.

subsection.name: How to run
subsection.p: First, build the sample as follows. This will compile the sample into a jar file.
To run this sample, type the following command:

The <email endpointURL> specifies how the program connects to the mail server. It can be something like "smtp://hangman@kohsuke.org!pop3://userid:password@mail.kohsuke.org/". See this document for details
If started successfully, you'll see the following message:
subsection.source: engine started and ready for action
subsection.p: Now you can write an e-mail to the e-mail address you specified in the above endpoint URL, and it will start a new hangman game. When the e-mail is received by the program, you'll see the following message:
subsection.source: Starting a new game for Kohsuke Kawaguchi <kohsuke.kawaguchi@sun.com>
subsection.p: And the program sends a reply e-mail like this:
Pick a character from A to Z by replying to this e-mail, like this:
subsection.source:
hangman@kohsuke.org wrote: > Word: _ _ _ _ > > You Chose: __________________________ > > 6 more guesses > >
x
-- Kohsuke Kawaguchi Sun Microsystems kohsuke.kawaguchi@sun.com
subsection.p: When this e-mail gets delivered to the program, it prints out the following line, and sends back a reply. Repeat this process until you find the correct answer, or you run out of your chances.
subsection.source: Received a reply from Kohsuke Kawaguchi <kohsuke.kawaguchi@sun.com>
subsection.p: The conversation logic is implemented in the HangmanWorkflow class, and it should be straight-forward to follow.

subsection.name: More about this game
subsection.p: This sample can handle multiple concurrent hangman games very naturally --- there will be one instance of HangmanWorkflow for one on-going game. Send mutliple e-mails to the program from a single e-mail address, and you can see that they create different Hangman games.

The other experiment you should do is to kill the program and restart it. Dalma persists the state of on-going conversations, so information about the on-going hangman games will survive the VM shutdown.
You can browse the complete source code online.

subsection.name: But I don't have a mail account I can play with!
subsection.p: I deployed this sample at hangman at kohsuke dot org, so you can write to this e-mail address and play the hangman game. To make it interesting, this program shuts down every half an hour and restarted half an hour later.
